website_summaries.verdict: Jungle Moc AC+ Pro Work shoes feature a comparable comfort to Merrell’s legendary and much-loved Jungle Moc silhouette. The shoes are slip-ons and built along the same lines as the original Moc although tweaks were made to make them easily adapt to work environments.The sneakers provide a firm grip on wet surfaces, and the arch support is excellent. However, the soles don’t seem to last long and lose their treads quickly.
pros: Most users were unanimous in saying Merrell Jungle Moc AC+ Pro Work shoes are comfortable right out of the box
The bottoms of the low-top sneakers are very slip-resistant which comes in handy when working in constantly damp or wet areas, many testers noted
In several reviews, Merrell Jungle Moc AC+ Pro Work shoes were commended by buyers for providing arch support that is second to none
The sneakers have a clean styling that can pass for “medium-dressy” shoes, according to a good number of purchasers
A few individuals were pleased with the easy on and off access of these kicks from Merrell
The work shoes feel lightweight, a handful stated
cons: Several purchasers were disappointed that these shoes featured soft soles which wear out fast
One person mentioned that the shoes crease a lot near the toes

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 month
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when these shoes came back in the market as they are highly rated and recommended. These shoes are comfortable, they fit great, and they feel great for any active person in the food industry. They look nice too which is always a bonus. The problem is the tread began separating from the shoe just after the first two months. Which is pathetic in terms of quality and build. I've tried glueing them several times and nothing has worked more than a few days so far. You can see in the photos where it's loose and parts have fallen off and it's been glued back. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DM Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for a Bartender...
customer_reviews.text: I am a outside bartender @ the largest resort in Orlando. My feet never stop moving from the time I get to work till the time I leave. These shoes are slip resident and the most comfortable you can buy. I have worn Sketchers, NewBalance, and any shoe you can think of that makes slip resident. Merrell makes the most comfortable. I am so glad they decided to started making these again!!! They are not cheap but if you need dry feet that don't slip and comfortable shoes. Spend the money. Also I usually wear 11 but buy 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Apples136

customer_reviews.title: The nonslip does not last
customer_reviews.text: The non-slip pads wore off in less than a month. I paid 134 for these shoes that haven't lasted. I need shoes that will work for a longer period of time. I was so excited to have shoes that fit comfortably. Now, I have to find something longer lasting
customer_reviews.author: William B

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes, a bit narrow on the top of foot
customer_reviews.text: I think these are too snug around the top of the shoe/ ankle. I read that they run narrow so I ordered a half size up. I do agree about the narrow part. I like these shoes, except the top of the shoe, ankle area is very snug and a little higher on my foot than I prefer, there is toe room, though. My heels bother me a lot and these do help that problem. So overall I would buy them again, however I don't understand the price being so much higher for the pro tread compared to the regular tread, they're pretty much double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robinblythe

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes except...
customer_reviews.text: Merrell moccasins are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. This is my third pair and, as always, my go-to shoes. The only thing I’ve found is that for slip-on shoes, the inside heel/spine lining never holds up. It tears up and erodes from the abrasion of slipping in and out of the shoe, combined with I guess whatever little heel friction happens when you walk. Still, they’re way too comfortable not to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like they say “Comfortable out of the box . These work shoes are another quality Merrell product. I have been buying Merrill shoes since I put on my first pair 10 years ago. I find their footwear to be consistently comfortable, stylish, and durable. Two thumbs up 👍
customer_reviews.author: DJ Paul

customer_reviews.title: I wish I can have my money back!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually review stuff that I brought in internet specifically from Amazon!! but this time I have to do it!! I brought this shoes because I work in the restaurant industry and I thought they will last longer than my last pair or similar(year and half) but is been only TWO months since I started wearing them and they are breaking apart ..seriously!!!! They were over a hundred dollars worth..just look at the pictures for evidence..not good..🤨 I wish I can have my money back or some sort of credit!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a transport driver and loves these shoes for their fit, comfort and durability. Her job takes her to many settings often where there are various materials on floor surfaces. She has actually worn through a 2-year-old pair of these shoes. She is now on her fourth pair and loves them. This purchase makes number 5.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Robson

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Pieces started falling off both shoes almost immediately. I was hoping to get a better product for how much these shoes cost.
customer_reviews.author: Betty H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and durability
customer_reviews.text: This is a great show! I've gotten a lot of use out of these, and they've worn well. Great support, and work in both casual and work environments. I like the slip on design, and they're my go to shoe when not wearing sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bloome

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Omg comfort outta the box.... Polish them as soon as you get um if your gonna get um wet. Update.... After 10 months they are worn out only worn for work for the price I think they should have lasted longer. Still a great shoe if you can afford um twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, I stand on average 11 hours a day. Good shoes, slip resistant and hold up well. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Notamusician

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Wore the shoes to work for the first dat today. They are quite comfortable, the non-slip works very well. I am a veterinary nurse so I need a comfortable non-slip, waterproof shoe. I hope these shoes last. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Can't take the 90 hour work week for more than a month
customer_reviews.text: Apparently less than 1 month in a professional kitchen is all it takes for the tread on these shoes to start to tear off. I loved my merrells in the past but this pair in particular seem to not be up to Merrell standards. I do not drag my feet at all and it seems like a month of 16 hour days 6 days a week is too much for the tread which is the most important part of non slip shoes hopefully they will replace these free of any charges
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY FIND SOMETHING ELSE
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time researching non slip shoes for work and I ended up going with these. First off, they are the worst non slips I've ever put on, I find myself constantly slipping and sliding throughout our kitchen. Second, they are NOT designed well at all, and you'll constantly trip over yourself. I highly suggest taking your 120$ and buying a pair of non slip sketchers at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Javier

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Awesome 9-5 work shoes and slip resistant my last pair lasted 4 years with daily wear and work duties
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, just what I was looking for in a shoe. Comfort & Support!
customer_reviews.author: Viking Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not as nonslip as shoes for crews but much more comfortable. I've been a high volume bartender for 28 years and these are the best shoes I've had. Arch support is a bit lacking but I put insoles in anyway for which there is plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Tread of shoe peeling off in 1 month of use. Very poor quality product
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: great shoe with the slip resistant sole.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe for being on my feet all day. This like my 3rd pair. The other 2 fit perfectly and these are just a bit bigger. Will still get my moneys worth out if them.
customer_reviews.author: David Broafoot

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable non slip shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these I have owned. I work in a restaurant and they are a great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Will make a good work shoe. Quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: PRTW1954

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great work shoe especially in a restaurant setting. Love this shoe for the non skid factor and being water resistant. Good comfort for long days standing
customer_reviews.author: teresa morrow

customer_reviews.title: Sent used pair of shoes by seller but shoes are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe but I paid $130 for a new pair of shoes and received an obviously worn/returned pair of shoes. Unfortunately, my feet are killing me so I need to start wearing these used shoes tonight but am not excited about the wrinkles/creases outside and dog hair inside.
customer_reviews.author: mr_roboto

customer_reviews.title: lower quality materials and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: the materials used in making this shoe are not up to the those used in most Merrell footwear (I have roughly a dozen other pairs of a style similar to this one)
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Rugloski

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Old used insole found in shoe. For $120 this is extremely disappointing. Will be returning and then ordering directly from Merrell
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rosenthal

product_meta.title: Merrell Jungle Moc AC+ PRO Work Shoe -
product_meta.description: The same out-of-the box comfort you love from our original Jungle Moc, designed with all day comfort and protection in mind. With waterproof full grain leather uppers and Merrell M Select PRO GRIP oil resistant, slip resistant rubber for smart protection and grip on the move.
feature_bullets: For out-of-the-box comfort you can't go wrong with the easy style of the Merrell® Jungle Moc AC+ Pro slip-on shoe.
Side goring for a better fit and feel.

Heel pull tab. Breathable mesh lining. FIT.ECO blended EVA footbed is contoured and features organic odor control. EVA midsole provides daylong comfort and stability. Full-length Merrell Air Cushion+ outsole supplies lasting underfoot cushioning. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
